content: Hi all, due to popular demand (and as discussed in San Antonio), we are going to alternate our .NET FHIR Community standup meeting times between 2pm EST (20:00 western europe) and 5am EST (11:00 western europe), to cater for the US, EU and AU participants. See the agenda here: https://github.com/ewoutkramer/fhir-net-api/wiki/20190204-Community-Meeting-Agenda. The meeting takes place every two weeks.

Hey all, just a heads up that we have re-started our series of .NEt API community meetings.

  • Read the notes of the last EU-timezone meeting here: https://github.com/FirelyTeam/fhir-net-api/wiki/20190708-Community-Meeting-Minutes
  • Next standup on US-timezone is in two weeks, see https://github.com/FirelyTeam/fhir-net-api/wiki.

Also, we record all sessions here: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UC9tiYNtYF9-hh9FP7KF2sgA/videos
